Uses of Class
math.geom2d.line.LineSegment2D

  • Packages that use LineSegment2D 
    Package Description
    math.geom2d.circulinear.buffer
    Computation of buffer for circulinear shapes.
    math.geom2d.grid
    Infinite grids with various geometries (square, triangle).
    math.geom2d.line
    Implementations of 'linear shapes', i.e. curves which can be embedded into a straight lines, like straight lines, line segments, or rays.
    math.geom2d.polygon
    Definitions and implementations of shapes composed several line segments: polylines, rings, polygons.
